name: Seth & Nirva
description: '''Seth & Nirva''' are an American [[Christian music]] husband-and-wife duo from [[Nashville, Tennessee]]. They started making music together in 2013. They have released one [[extended play]], ''I Need You'' (2013), and one [[studio album]], ''[[Never Alone (Seth & Nirva album)|Never Alone]]'' (2016), which was released album with [[Integrity Music]].
